Text: Eta, could you explain what this "magic gear" is?
...Mm...sure.

...For example, a dark knight's sword...is infused
with a degree of magic when forged...so magic
flows effortlessly through it.

That's because the more potent the wielder's magic...
the more it resonates with the magic flow, increasing
its effect.

Magic gear are tools that focus on and specialize
in...improving the flow of magic...thus, enhancing
various abilities.

As magic gear will strengthen the Garden...I've
created a dedicated workshop for them.
Well...guess that neatly sums it up.

Neatly?! Are you telling me you built a dedicated
workshop without anyone's permission?!

Eta's right in pointing out that one challenge the
Garden faces is how to increase our members'
abilities.

There's both the need and potential for the Seven
Shadows to produce and experiment with possible
solutions.

Of course, Lady Alpha, but she could've at least said
something about it!
It's not like the Garden has limitless capital...
It...doesn't?!
Of course not!
Now now, Gamma.

And why am I the one experimenting with this magic
gear?

Hate to admit it, but I'm sure the rest of you in
the Seven Shadows would be―well, more ideal.
Yeah...truth is, Gamma...you're not ideal.
Then why me?!

The fact you're not ideal...makes you the perfect
test subject.

In other words, because the magic gear increases
abilities, you'd like to experiment on the member
in the Seven Shadows whose abilities can be
improved the most.

Yeah. When it comes to combat...Gamma isn't that
strong.
Ohhh... You just had to say it, didn't you?

Please calm down, Lady Gamma! She only means that in
comparison to the others in the Seven Shadows. You're
obviously far stronger than any of the other Garden
members—
Besides...you’ve seemed kinda...complacent recently.

Excuse me? I'd rather not be lectured by someone
always cooped up with their experiments—
...Gamma?

No way! Master Shadow must've seen through my current
state and feelings...
...Did he tell you something?
Yes...

"Keep it up, Gamma. Always strive to improve yourself,
and don't get complacent at the new base. Upholding
that mindset will strengthen your foundation."

He said that?! It really is as if he predicted your
current state.

Perhaps he was warning me, seeing how relaxed I was
about the new base after we'd just seized Alexandria.

For the Garden, the real battle is yet to come.
We must never let stability get the better of us
and make us complacent. Master Shadow must
have expected all of this.

True. Increasing my abilities will directly affect
how much I can strengthen the foundation of the
entire Shadow Garden, not to mention the Seven
Shadows!
Alright...let's do it.

...That's right, I'm in! Bring on the magic gear,
golems, or whatever!
No taking back...what you said...
Agh... I-I know that!
Lambda, prepare the experiment.
Sir! Yes sir!

It seems this will be an interesting...but extremely
risky experiment.
Wow...
Incredible!
Heehee...
Huh? Am I...strong?!

The enhancing qualities of the magic gear compensate
for the abilities that Gamma lacked.

Indeed... It can be used not only to reduce
weaknesses but also to improve on
natural strengths.

The changes may not be drastic, but minor differences
can sometimes be the deciding factor, especially in
challenging circumstances.
Yeah, that's the effect of...magic gear...
Heheh...Lambda.
What! Are you certain about this?
I-If something were to happen to Lady Gamma...
Do it.
But...
I'll assist if something goes wrong.
Lady Alpha... Sir! Yes sir!

Come on then, bring it on! Nothing can stand against
my sword!
Eta! There's way too many—
Heehee...
You! Are you trying to kill me?!
Can't say I killed you...unless you die.
That's not the point! Do you even care if I die?
If you die...well...it is what it is.
Excuuuse meeee?!

I've successfully crafted and prepared...high-quality
magic gear. Use it for the next battle.
Wait, how...?!
Is it difficult to craft high-quality magic gear?

It's possible to craft magic gear of any quality, so
long as you have all the materials required.

However, when it comes to stably increasing magic
when aiming for an effect or added value beyond
standard performance...it requires patience.

Stabilizing the flow of magic is a tricky task—guess
it's the same with magic gear.
...Gamma. Use your head. Just win.
Eeeetaaaa!!!
